list_translation_mean.translate_mean: sự toan dò xét người nào

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a mechanical device using suction or pressure to raise or move liquids, compress gases, or force air into inflatable objects such as tires.
an active transport mechanism in living cells by which specific ions are moved through the cell membrane against a concentration gradient.
a woman's plain, lightweight shoe that has a low-cut upper, no fastening, and typically a medium heel.
force (liquid, gas, etc.) to move by or as if by means of a pump.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the blood is pumped around the body
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Máu được bơm xung quanh cơ thể

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: draw (milk) from the breast using a breast pump, typically in order to feed a baby by means of a bottle.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she struggled with pumping enough milk
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô vật lộn với việc bơm đủ sữa

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: fill (something such as a tire or balloon) with liquid or gas using a pump.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I pumped the tires and oiled the chain
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi bơm lốp xe và bôi dầu chuỗi

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: we had to pump the handle like mad
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Chúng tôi đã phải bơm tay cầm như điên

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: try to elicit information from (someone) by persistent questioning.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she began to pump her friend for details
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô bắt đầu bơm bạn mình để biết chi tiết
